title: FS: N173 Old Judge Cabinet Mike King Kelly
author: piecesofthegame

posts.post_title: FS: N173 Old Judge Cabinet Mike King Kelly
posts.post_content:
Offering this Old Judge cabinet of HOFer King Kelly with a nice dark image. Top and bottom tack holes account for the grade but are thankfully far removed from the image.
Reduced to $4250 net to me

me[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20200324/ac550b87b46f0d095b37ab36ce131bdb.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20200324/8f601cb74e67e47b5cbe587a23da5a52.jpg[/IMG]

Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Offering this beauty for sale again.
$4450 net to me. Great image and clarity!

This is still available and although I’d prefer a straight cash deal I thought I’d include a few cards from my want list that could go towards a partial cash/trade.
I’m only interested in low grade cards with nice eye appeal. I love authentic and high eye appeal 1 and 2 grades. Feel free to reach out if you have some stuff from my want list.

N162 Anson
N162 Brouthers
N162 Keefe 
N28 Clarkson
T205 Cobb, Johnson, Cy Young
M101-5 Joe Jackson very low grade
33 Goudey Ruth #181
Almost any 33 Goudey HoFers
1949 Bowman Paige
1953 topps Mantle
